description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Experience a unique 8 Player FPS DeathMatches that breaks all the rules you're used to, as well as the ground beneath you! Test your skills offline against challenging bots or with a friend. Split screen is supported. Double XP Weekends! New levels and powerups get patched in weekly!
